label: Moulton, John K.  2017. The true identity of Dixa modesta Johannsen (Diptera: Dixidae) resolved:  synonymy of Dixa similis Johannsen, designation of the Dixa ubiquita species group, and description of three new eastern Nearctic species. Zootaxa 4216(3): 247–260.
